multiHqlReportIndex.hql: select projectid, activitychannelid, concat(dtime,hourstime) htime , dayorderproduct from ( select projectid, if(activitychannelid is null,'ALL',activitychannelid) activitychannelid, t.dtime dtime, '00' hourstime, if(h00orderproduct is null,0,h00orderproduct) dayorderproduct from video.t_video_users_order_product_day_analyse_d_hbase t union all select projectid, if(activitychannelid is null,'ALL',activitychannelid) activitychannelid, t.dtime dtime, '01' hourstime, if(h01orderproduct is null,0,h01orderproduct) dayorderproduct from projectid,activitychannelid,concat(dtime,hourstime),dayorderproduct
